data.text: @MsLaheyPE It’s one of my fav Scenes from an awesome show.
@z56cjt I will continue wearing a mask, but I have a feeling that once the mandates are all gone, it's going to be hard to keep people out of your personal space. I hope I am wrong.
@shelleytdalton I think that’s true for those vaccinated and those non vulnerable. For the most part I will be living things as normal but will continue to mask up.

@z56cjt I think people need to do what they reasonably can to avoid Covid,but we are not in the same situation we were two years ago. With vaccines, masks and new treatments, it is not worth it to give up life and live in fear.
@ColinStuckless Yeah I think that might be something we do differently next time. Agree with the concerns around this.

@z56cjt Both my kids did 6 weeks of mandatory self isolation when perfectly healthy last year due to travel. Then they still got it this year & had to isolate again & were over it in a couple days with very mild symptoms.

I wouldn't do that over - isolating when not sick is cruel.
@chris_pj1991 Yup same situation we are in. Luckily we both wfh but don’t want to risk exposing our parents in anyway.
@z56cjt Seriously, one absolutely no reason for me to be there and two we have both avoiding it so far and both have parents in 60's and 70's who have also avoided it
@chris_pj1991 Yup can’t blame you for that.
